scripts.build:types: INSTA_UPDATE=always mise exec --env dev cargo:cargo-insta -- cargo-insta test --features codegen --test codegen
scripts.doc:dependency-diagram: cargo run -p hash-repo-chores -- dependency-diagram --output docs/dependency-diagram.mmd --root hash-graph-authorization --root-deps-and-dependents --link-mode non-roots --include-dev-deps --include-build-deps --logging-console-level info
scripts.test:unit: mise run test:unit @rust/hash-graph-authorization --test-strategy=powerset -- --all-targets --filterset 'not kind(test) & not kind(bench)'
